total_concurrent_periods.description: Number of periods with concurrent positions

concurrency_ratio.description: Ratio of concurrent periods to total periods

exclusive_ratio.description: Ratio of periods with exactly one strategy in position

inactive_ratio.description: Ratio of periods with no active strategies

expectancy.description: Combined expectancy per trade across all strategies

activity.description: Multiplier effect from strategy activity levels

cvar_95.description: Combined Conditional Value at Risk (95% confidence)

cvar_99.description: Combined Conditional Value at Risk (99% confidence)

mean.description: Average number of signals per month

median.description: Median number of signals per month

std_below.description: One standard deviation below mean signals

std_above.description: One standard deviation above mean signals

total.description: Total number of signals across period

efficiency_score.description: Risk-adjusted performance score for this strategy
